summary: Pål dreams about success within the musical world, but he has an obstacle; himself. His deep thoughts keeps him end up in trouble. We follow Pål on a emotional inner travel to find his call on the swedish west coast of Gothenburg.
cast: Adam Lundgren|Marie Richardson|Josefin Neldén|Eric Ericson|Tomas von Brömssen|Reine Brynolfsson|Maja Kin|Disa Östrand|David Färdmar|Daniel Larsson|Jonathan Andersson|Gunilla Nyroos|Gregers Dohn|Kim Lantz|Ebbot Lundberg|Isabelle Johannesson|Håkan Hellström|Hanna Hedin Hillberg|Freddie Wadling|Daniel Johansson|Jack Nilsson|Linn Wennergren|Lucas Miklin|Olle Björk|Ivar Tengnér|Anders von Hofsten|Mathias Ek|Darko Savor|Valter Kinbom|Staffan Björk|Per Ekdahl|Micke Nilsson|Erik Dahlström|Victor Furbacken|Ida Jensen|Tilde Vallbo|Per Stålberg|Edward Forslund|Tobias Sandström|Daniel Bangert|Lasse Persson|Hugo Welther|Simone Moreno|Leon Andreasson|Jerker Eklund|Madeleine Jacobsson|Jonas Jörgensen|Joel Kullberg
title: Känn ingen sorg
